thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Account Executive - Chicago - Sports Equipment

title: Account Executive - Chicago - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: You'll develop accurate and realistic seasonal assortments, forecasts and scenario plans. You'll also identify product opportunities and execute product strategies...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
